mapper.insert: INSERT INTO movie_reservation ( user_id, title, province_name, city, show_date, show_time, screen_name, seat_no, seat_id, price ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{title}, #{provinceName}, #{city}, #{showDate}, #{showTime}, #{screenName}, #{seatNo}, #{seatId}, #{price} )
mapper.select: SELECT movie_reserve_no, user_id, title, province_name, city, show_date, show_time, screen_name, seat_id, price FROM movie_reservation WHERE movie_reserve_no > 0 ORDER BY movie_reserve_no DESC
SELECT movie_reserve_no, user_id, title, province_name, city, show_date, show_time, screen_name, seat_id, price FROM movie_reservation WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY movie_reserve_no DESC

SELECT seat_no, seat_id, price FROM movie_seat s INNER JOIN movie_time t ON s.city = t.city AND s.screen_name = t.screen_name WHERE (t.city = #{city} AND t.title = #{title}) AND (t.show_date = #{showDate} AND t.show_time = #{showTime});
